rescuecore2.log

Interface LogReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLogReader, FileLogReader, StreamLogReader

    public interface LogReader
    An interface for objects that know how to read log files.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandsRecord getCommands(int time)
      Get the agent commands at a particular timestep.
      Config getConfig()
      Get the configuration entry in the log file.

      Get the last timestep recorded in this log.

      Get the perception record for a particular entity at a particular time.
      UpdatesRecord getUpdates(int time)
      Get the simulator updates at a particular timestep.
      WorldModel<? extends Entity> getWorldModel(int time)
      Get the state of the world at a particular timestep.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfig

        Config getConfig()
                 throws LogException
        Get the configuration entry in the log file.
        Returns:
        The configuration stored in the log.
        Throws:
        LogException - If there is a problem reading the log.

      • getMaxTimestep

        int getMaxTimestep()
                   throws LogException
        Get the last timestep recorded in this log.
        Returns:
        The last timestep number.
        Throws:
        LogException - If there is a problem reading the log.

      • getWorldModel

        WorldModel<? extends Entity> getWorldModel(int time)
                                           throws LogException
        Get the state of the world at a particular timestep.
        Parameters:
        time - The timestep to look up. If this is zero then the world initial conditions will be returned.
        Returns:
        The world model at the given timestep.
        Throws:
        LogException - If there is a problem reading the log.

      • getEntitiesWithUpdates

        java.util.Set<EntityID> getEntitiesWithUpdates(int time)
                                               throws LogException
        Get the set of EntityIDs that have perception updates in a given timestep.
        Parameters:
        time - The timestep to look up.
        Returns:
        The set of EntityIDs that have perception records for that time.
        Throws:
        LogException - If there is a problem reading the log.

      • getPerception

        PerceptionRecord getPerception(int time,
                             EntityID entity)
                               throws LogException
        Get the perception record for a particular entity at a particular time.
        Parameters:
        time - The timestep to look up.
        entity - The entity to look up.
        Returns:
        The perception record for the timestep/agent, or null if there is no such entry.
        Throws:
        LogException - If there is a problem reading the log.

      • getCommands

        CommandsRecord getCommands(int time)
                           throws LogException
        Get the agent commands at a particular timestep.
        Parameters:
        time - The timestep to look up.
        Returns:
        The commands record for the timestep, or null if there is no commands record at that timestep.
        Throws:
        LogException - If there is a problem reading the log.

      • getUpdates

        UpdatesRecord getUpdates(int time)
                         throws LogException
        Get the simulator updates at a particular timestep.
        Parameters:
        time - The timestep to look up.
        Returns:
        The updates record for the timestep, or null if there is no updates record at that timestep.
        Throws:
        LogException - If there is a problem reading the log.
